commit message: Preparing for version 0.7
Optimized icons with optipng
Sorted permissions alphabetically
Added documentation to the manifest
Updated PreferencesActivity to call ToggleHandler indirectly through an Intent
Added support in ApiHandler and SmsReceiver for result data
Fixed an NPE in RemoteRingActivity
Added support for natively themed dialogs
Refactored *_INTENT to INTENT_* for consistency

Removed the internal API level

Third-party applications should use PackageManager's getPackageInfo to get
RingyDingyDingy's version.

Added a new icon as well as a 'disabled' variant of the new icon

Both icons are licensed under the CC BY-NC-SA 3.0 license. See README.txt in the
assets folder for details.
Updated NotificationHandler to show the disabled icon when applicable
Added a white border around the icon

Changed the icon to have green arcs when enabled and red arcs when disabled

User feedback indicated some confusion about the red arcs, because they
associated red with disabled. Hence, the red arc icon now is used for the
disabled icon and the new green arc icon is used for the enabled icon.
Condensed MainActivity's text

Changed how page works so that a page now overrides a ring in progress

Also, this fixed another emulator-only bug where multiple rings could take place
at once. This happened because 'ringtone' was always null in the event that a
ringtone could not be found. As there is now a different way to see if a ring is
happening, this bug is fixed.
Made pages cumulative
Fixed RemoteRingActivity not clearing pager messages when ringing stops
Added support for user chosen ringtones
Added a fail-safe that stops the ringtone when RingyDingyDingy is toggled
Changed RemoteRingActivity's theme in the manifest to make it invisible
Fixed all remaining (known) bugs where ringing does not stop

Added preliminary activation logging support

Sorry about this frankly huge patch, but I didn't want to commit a half-baked
schema and have to change it several times before the next release. This schema
should need very few changes, though it hopefully doesn't need any at all.
Added a menu to LogActivity with an entry to clear the log
Fixed the help command
Added a preference to toggle activation logging off and on
Added a preference to control the maximum size of the activation log
Added information about activation logging to MainActivity
Tweaked RemoteRingActivity to pull a contact's name when pages are accumulated
Fixed two cases of LogDatabase being opened without being closed
Added contact name lookup support to LogEntry
Fixed an NPE in PreferencesActivity
Fixed an instance of LogDatabase not being opened before use
Condensed MainActivity's text further
Tweaked LogEntry's toString format
Tweaked the summary of preferences_notification
Changed 'eye' to 'View' in the instructions to open the log with the Holo theme
Changed the sort order of the activation log to descending by timestamp
Made timestamps returned by LogEntry use the current locale's format
Version 0.7
